title: is playing soloq even worth my time right now?
body: was at 90 lp winstreak, then just lierally like 6 games in a teammates afking or inting *no not the "doing bad" inting the INTING inting* and i get demoted, how is this fair?

replies.body:
Nope, wait for the next champion release for things to finally get nerfed and things to change. (7.10 is gonna be a dodge dont play patch till heim and a bunch of things get nerfed.)

Once 10 bans come in, MAYBE MAYBEEEEEE this game will be worth the money people invest in.

But currently this season is so far worse than season 6 by far. Might be time to move on to a new game till Riot actually gets good developers and such.
Sometimes you get ints on your team, sometimes you get ints on the enemy team. Free wins balance out free losses eventually.
Just like a slot machine hits eventually.

Ditto. It's like the MMR gods are SUDDENLY VERY angry at me sometimes with me and the other people on my team relative to the entire opposing team.

Bronze/silver vs. gold/plat/diamond

...HELLO?!?!?

"Protect new players and reduce toxicity" my hairy backside!
